channel.title: BTS on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in BTS on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: ‘KPop Demon Hunters’ Review: Netflix’s Surprise Smash Is a Dazzlingly Animated, Infectiously Soundtracked Treat
item.description: Lee Byung-hun and Daniel Dae Kim are among the voice cast for one of the streamer’s most popular originals ever, a Sony-produced musical about a superstar girl group battling an evil boy band.

item.title: ‘KPop Demon Hunters’ Review: Netflix’s Surprise Smash Is a Dazzlingly Animated, Infectiously Soundtracked Treat

item.title: K-pop Stars BTS Release First Live Album ‘Permission To Dance On Stage’ (Exclusive Photo)
item.description: All seven members of the supergroup recently completed their mandatory military service and the band is expected to release a new album and tour next year.
